title: The Rape of Innocence: Taking Captivity Captive
description: This poignant, life-changing story of sexual, physical and parental abuse is absolutely riveting! Lacresha Hayes shares pages from her own life while reaching out to victims to show them hope and a light at the end of the tunnel of despair. This book is disturbing in that it paints an ugly picture of a hidden society, but it is also triumphant and shows the power of humanity when we believe in ourselves.
author: Lacresha Hayes
